name: The Forsaken Flame
description:
A top-down puzzle dungeon game with only your flaming sword to guide you.

Controls:

Movement: WASD
Look direction: Mouse
Swing sword: Left click
Throw and recall sword: Right click
Pause/Settings: Escape key

Stuck? You can Reset the level in the settings menu :)

Your sword will light the way Solve puzzles and battle enemies as you navigate through a labyrinth of darkness
